resources.string: Enable this option so that the device can automatically enter sleep when it stops being charged
Display a dialog, in which the user can cancel the auto sleep.
The time the cancel dialog is displayed. After the delay, the device will enter sleep.
Display extra information about this program

Auto Sleep will bring your device in sleep when the device is no longer being charged. This is especially useful when you are using your device as a navigation system in your car.
